member.name: T:NGravatar.Gravatar

member.name: M:NGravatar.Gravatar.Render(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an img tag whose source is the address of the Gravatar for the specified .
member.param: The email address whose Gravatar should be rendered.
member.returns: An HTML img tag of the rendered Gravatar.

member.returns: The URI of the Gravatar for the specified .

member.param: The email address whose Gravatar should be rendered.
Additional attributes to include in the img tag.
member.returns: An HTML img tag of the rendered Gravatar.

member.name: P:NGravatar.Gravatar.DefaultImage
member.summary: The default image to be shown if no Gravatar is found for an email address.

member.name: P:NGravatar.Gravatar.Size
member.summary: The size, in pixels, of the Gravatar to render.

member.name: P:NGravatar.Gravatar.MaxRating
member.summary: The maximum Gravatar rating allowed to display.

member.name: T:NGravatar.Html.UrlHelperExtensions
member.summary: UrlHelper extension methods for retrieving Gravatar avatar images.

member.summary: Gets the URI of the Gravatar image for the specifications.
member.param: The UrlHelper object getting the URI.
The email whose Gravatar source should be returned.
The size of the requested Gravatar.
The default image to return if no Gravatar is found for the specified .
The maximum Gravatar rating to allow for requested images..
member.returns: The URI of the Gravatar for the specifications.

member.returns: The URI of the Gravatar for the specifications.

member.param: The UrlHelper object getting the link.
The email whose Gravatar profile link should be returned.
member.returns: A link to the Gravatar profile page for the given .

member.summary: Renders a script tag with the specified for handling the profile JSON data.
member.param: The HtmlHelper object that renders the script tag.
The email of the Gravatar profile whose JSON data should be used by the .

member.returns: An HTML script tag that can be included in a page.

member.name: T:NGravatar.Grofile
member.summary: Class to provide functionality for dealing with Gravatar profile information.

member.name: M:NGravatar.Grofile.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NGravatar.Grofile.GetLink(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the URL that links to the Gravatar profile of the specified .
member.param: The email whose profile should be linked.
member.returns: The URL of the profile for the specified .

member.name: M:NGravatar.Grofile.GetInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Parses Gravatar profile information for the specified into an object.
member.param: The email whose profile information should be returned.
member.returns: An object that contains information about the Gravatar profile for the specified .

member.name: M:NGravatar.Grofile.RenderScript(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a script tag that can be included in an HTML page to process a Gravatar profile on the client.
member.param: The email whose profile should be processed.
The JavaScript callback function which should be called after the profile information is loaded. The profile information will be passed as a paramter to this callback.
member.returns: A rendered script tag that can be included in an HTML page.

member.summary: Gets the domain of this account.

member.name: P:NGravatar.GrofileAccount.Username
member.summary: Gets the username of this account.

member.summary: Gets a display string for this account.

member.summary: Gets the URL of this account.

member.name: P:NGravatar.GrofileAccount.Shortname
member.summary: Gets the short name of this account.

member.name: T:NGravatar.GrofileName
member.summary: The name field of a Gravatar profile.

member.name: M:NGravatar.GrofileName.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the Gravatar profile name.
member.param: The full formatted name.
The family name or surname.
The given name or first name.
The middle name.
The prefix of the name.
The suffix of the name.

member.name: M:NGravatar.GrofileName.ToString
member.summary: Gets the name formatted as a string.
member.returns: The string formatted name.

member.name: P:NGravatar.GrofileName.Formatted
member.summary: Gets the full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display (e.g. Mr. Joseph Robert Smarr, Esq.). This is the Primary Sub-Field for this field, for the purposes of sorting and filtering.

member.name: P:NGravatar.GrofileName.FamilyName
member.summary: Gets the family name of this Contact, or "Last Name" in most Western languages (e.g. Smarr given the full name Mr. Joseph Robert Smarr, Esq.).

member.name: P:NGravatar.GrofileName.GivenName
member.summary: Gets the given name of this Contact, or "First Name" in most Western languages (e.g. Joseph given the full name Mr. Joseph Robert Smarr, Esq.).

member.name: P:NGravatar.GrofileName.MiddleName
member.summary: Gets the middle name(s) of this Contact (e.g. Robert given the full name Mr. Joseph Robert Smarr, Esq.).

member.name: P:NGravatar.GrofileName.HonorificPrefix
member.summary: Gets the honorific prefix(es) of this Contact, or "Title" in most Western languages (e.g. Mr. given the full name Mr. Joseph Robert Smarr, Esq.).

member.name: P:NGravatar.GrofileName.HonorificSuffix
member.summary: Gets the honorifix suffix(es) of this Contact, or "Suffix" in most Western languages (e.g. Esq. given the full name Mr. Joseph Robert Smarr, Esq.).
